BodyName: Committee on Fire and Criminal Justice Services

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Division of Probation and Correctional Alternatives to distribute State Probation funding equitably, especially recognizing the disproportionate share of adult felons and juvenile delinquents supervised by the New York City Department of Probation who would otherwise be confined in State custody.
Items.MatterName: NYS Division of Probation and Correctional Alternatives to distribute State Probation funding equitably.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting requirements of the departments of fire and correction.
Items.MatterName: Reporting requirements of the departments of fire and correction.
